features.featureTitle: Update the SurvivalGuideSection component to rebrand the section heading and attribution so it reads 'Timmy and Ricay's Survival Tips' (or styled variant like 'Timmy & Ricay's Survival Tips'). The five existing survival tips should remain unchanged in content; only the section title/byline attribution must reflect both names. Keep the existing distressed typewriter aesthetic.

Implement a full-screen code entry gate that blocks access to all site content until the user submits the correct code '2112'. When the site loads, display a full-screen overlay (matching the Backrooms/Dreamcore aesthetic â€” void black background, fluorescent accent, monospace font) with a prompt such as 'Enter Access Code' and a text input field plus a submit button.
